attributes.action: Restrict The European Unions Influences in The United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently The European Commission creates unfair and not very practical laws and legislation, Why can't Prime Minister Gordon Brown give more power to Britain and expell the European Dictatorship over Our Human Rights. For once just give the people of britain a choice about the European Commission being on British soil

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
